summary: Now Farkas can look like your typical generic JRPG hero. Yay.
descriptionHtml:
===========
Description
===========
Now Farkas can look like your typical generic JRPG hero. Yay. While you save Tamriel,
HE\'LL SAVE THE WORLD.

Basically, I got bored and wanted to try this new NPC Editor gizmo out. Hearing Sven\'s
voice in Japanese reminded me of a typical teenage-esque hero in one of dem Japanese
games, so I turned him into one. I thought I\'d do one for Farkas, too, so here he is.

============
Requirements
============
1) ApachiiSkyHair for the hair:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Note: You don\'t really need this next one. I just use it because it makes males look
better. I used the Younger Faces & Geonox version in my screenshots.

2) Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488

============
Installation
============
Put both the esp and the bsa in your \\Skyrim\\Data folder. Hopefully, it should work fine.
If not, tell me and I\'ll try and fix it myself. This was a really quick job, so I expect
an issue or two.

====
Note
====
Farkas might spawn with a hood for you. Well, he did for me at least. Just open console, 
select him, and type \"openactorcontainer 1\", then remove the hood. First time uploading here,
so if I do anything wrong, please say so.

=======
Credits
=======
Thanks to Apachii for the hairs, foretrenty for the npc editor, and Chris57 for the face textures. I don\'t care what you do with this mod, but please respect the other guys.
author: yakusai
